content.task: URGENT: Multi-agent system status reporting broken. Agent manager shows "System Status: stopped" and all agents in "initializing" state, but MCP interface works. Need immediate DevOps diagnosis of agent state management infrastructure. Also: CI pipeline has 2 critical failures that were falsely reported as success.
content.context: Root cause analysis reveals disconnect between agent initialization success and system status reporting. agents.json or background services may be failing. Also need to fix CI issues: security scan failure (hardcoded password in bandit-report.json) and linting failures (complexity + import redefinitions). Previous session made false success claims.
